00038 void RequestHandlerLoadRange::run() {
00039   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   TableIdentifier table;
00041   RangeSpec range;
00042   RangeState range_state;
00043   const char *transfer_log_dir;
00044   uint16_t flags;
00045   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00046   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00047 
00048   // Table
00049   if (!table.decode(&msgPtr, &remaining))
00050     goto abort;
00051 
00052   // Range
00053   if (!range.decode(&msgPtr, &remaining))
00054     goto abort;
00055 
00056   // transfer_log_dir
00057   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &transfer_log_dir))
00058     goto abort;
00059 
00060   if (!range_state.decode(&msgPtr, &remaining))
00061     goto abort;
00062   
00063   // flags
00064   if (!Serialization::decode_short(&msgPtr, &remaining, &flags))
00065     goto abort;
00066 
00067   m_range_server->load_range(&cb, &table, &range, transfer_log_dir, &range_state, flags);
00068 
00069   return;
00070 
00071  abort:
00072   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with LoadRange message");
00073   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with LoadRange message");
00074 }
